info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: The List VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections operation retrieves all the virtual network gateways connections created.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key.

get.description: Gets the specified virtual network gateway connection by resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update virtual network gateway connection operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

delete.description: Deletes the specified virtual network Gateway connection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Delete successful.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to update virtual network gateway connection tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: The Get VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation retrieves information about the specified virtual network gateway connection shared key through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection shared key name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resources.

put.description: The Put VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the Begin Set Virtual Network Gateway connection Shared key operation throughNetwork resource provider.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ConnectionSharedKey resource.

201.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ConnectionSharedKey resource.

post.description: The VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionResetSharedKey operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection reset shared key Name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the begin reset virtual network gateway connection shared key operation through network resource provider.

200.description: Request successful. The operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key.

202.description: Request successful. The operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key.

post.description: Starts packet capture on virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Virtual network gateway packet capture parameters supplied to start packet capture on gateway connection.

200.description: Request successful. The operation packet capture started on virtual network gateway connection.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Stops packet capture on virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway Connection.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Virtual network gateway packet capture parameters supplied to stop packet capture on gateway connection.

200.description: Request successful. The operation packet capture stopped on virtual network gateway connection.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a xml format representation for vpn device configuration script.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection for which the configuration script is generated.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the generate vpn device script operation.

200.description: Xml format representation for vpn device configuration script.

post.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway is advertising to the specified peer.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: peer
parameters.description: The IP address of the peer.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: List of learned BGP routes.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: The GetBgpPeerStatus operation retrieves the status of all BGP peers.

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: List of BGP peer statuses.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway has learned, including routes learned from BGP peers.

parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: List of advertised BGP routes.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: The Get VpnclientIpsecParameters operation retrieves information about the vpnclient ipsec policy for P2S client of virtual network gateway in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the set vpnclient ipsec parameters for P2S client of VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

post.description: Gets pre-generated VPN profile for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group. The profile needs to be generated first using generateVpnProfile.

asn.description: The autonomous system number of the remote BGP peer.

connectedDuration.description: For how long the peering has been up.

localAddress.description: The virtual network gateway's local address.

messagesReceived.description: The number of BGP messages received.

messagesSent.description: The number of BGP messages sent.

routesReceived.description: The number of routes learned from this peer.

BgpPeerStatusListResult.description: Response for list BGP peer status API service call.

bgpPeeringAddress.description: The BGP peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.

peerWeight.description: The weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

keyLength.description: The virtual network connection reset shared key length, should between 1 and 128.

ConnectionResetSharedKey.description: The virtual network connection reset shared key.

value.description: The virtual network connection shared key value.

ConnectionSharedKey.description: Response for GetConnectionSharedKey API service call.

DhGroup.description: The DH Groups used in IKE Phase 1 for initial SA.

origin.description: The source this route was learned from.

sourcePeer.description: The peer this route was learned from.

GatewayRouteListResult.description: List of virtual network gateway routes.

saDataSizeKilobytes.description: The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) payload size in KB for a site to site VPN tunnel.

saLifeTimeSeconds.description: The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) lifetime in seconds for a site to site VPN tunnel.

IpsecPolicy.description: An IPSec Policy configuration for a virtual network gateway connection.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

value.description: A list of local network gateways that exists in a resource group.

gatewayIpAddress.description: IP address of local network gateway.

addressPrefixes.description: A list of address blocks reserved for this virtual network in CIDR notation.

localNetworkAddressSpace.description: AddressSpace contains an array of IP address ranges that can be used by subnets of the virtual network.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the local network gateway resource.

PfsGroup.description: The Pfs Groups used in IKE Phase 2 for new child SA.

localAddressRanges.description: A collection of local address spaces in CIDR format

remoteAddressRanges.description: A collection of remote address spaces in CIDR format

TrafficSelectorPolicy.description: An traffic selector policy for a virtual network gateway connection.

egressBytesTransferred.description: The Egress Bytes Transferred in this connection.

ingressBytesTransferred.description: The Ingress Bytes Transferred in this connection.

lastConnectionEstablishedUtcTime.description: The time at which connection was established in Utc format.

customRoutes.description: AddressSpace contains an array of IP address ranges that can be used by subnets of the virtual network.

enableBgp.description: Whether BGP is enabled for this virtual network gateway or not.

gatewayType.description: The type of this virtual network gateway.

ipConfigurations.description: IP configurations for virtual network gateway.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the virtual network gateway resource.

vpnGatewayGeneration.description: The generation for this VirtualNetworkGateway. Must be None if gatewayType is not VPN.

vpnType.description: The type of this virtual network gateway.

aadAudience.description: The AADAudience property of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource for vpn client connection used for AAD authentication.

aadIssuer.description: The AADIssuer property of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource for vpn client connection used for AAD authentication.

aadTenant.description: The AADTenant property of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource for vpn client connection used for AAD authentication.

items.description: VPN client protocol enabled for the virtual network gateway.

maxPacketsPerSecond.description: The max packets transferred per second.

privateIpAddress.description: The assigned private Ip of a connected vpn client.

publicIpAddress.description: The public Ip of a connected vpn client.

vpnConnectionDuration.description: The duration time of a connected vpn client.

vpnUserName.description: The user name of a connected vpn client.

saDataSizeKilobytes.description: The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) payload size in KB for P2S client..

clientRootCertificates.description: A list of client root certificates public certificate data encoded as Base-64 strings. Optional parameter for external radius based authentication with EAPTLS.

radiusServerAuthCertificate.description: The public certificate data for the radius server authentication certificate as a Base-64 encoded string. Required only if external radius authentication has been configured with EAPTLS authentication.

VpnClientParameters.description: Vpn Client Parameters for package generation.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

thumbprint.description: The revoked VPN client certificate thumbprint.
